Title: The Zan'thik Dig
Description:
We have just intercepted a message from an adjunct on Zan'vess. Yaungol laborers there have unearthed a paragon in the amber quarry on the back side of the island.

Get there immediately and free him before the Zan'thik destroy him!
ObjectivesText: Locate the unearthed paragon in the Amber Quarry on Zan'vess.
RewardText:
<From the looks of it, this mantid was just recently broken out of his chamber. He lets out a hacking cough.>

...Diss-ec...tor... has... returned...
